entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • AccessViolationException in Binder.LookupExtensionMethodsInSingleBinder causes ServiceHub crash #62059

Updated

  • Expected behavior for Go To Definition for metadata references #24349
    Backlog
  • Questions about SemanticEdit related public API. #59078
    17.3
  • Code Style for trailing commas #21784
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Cover module naming style under class #62141
    Area-IDE, Community

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62143
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use constant interpolated string analyzer #51705
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • Add prefer trailing commas code-style option #54859
    Area-IDE
  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE
  • Fix NRE in VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider #62075
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments in features/ref-fields #62088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • testing out caching common binary assets #62095
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to a shared stopwatch in the incremental generator #62134
    Area-Compilers
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid cascading diagnostics on error base type #62087
    Area-Compilers
  • Add `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` to `EqualityContract` property #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update tests to reflect BCL behavior changes #61456
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
